text: Current TV was an American television channel. It broadcast from August 1, 2005, to August 20, 2013. It began as a user-generated content channel with content made by viewers in 15-minute blocks. The channel later switched formats to become an independent news network aimed at progressive politics. Category:American television channels Category:2005 establishments in the United States Category:2013 disestablishments in the United States
title: Current TV
